titleStmt.title: An electronic transcription of Cairo Genizah Fragment TS E1.108 (Cambridge)
titleStmt.sponsor: Joseph and Rebecca Meyerhoff Center for Jewish Studies
Lieberman Institute; Primary Witnesses to Tannaitic Literature

publicationStmt.pubPlace: The Maryland Institute for Technology in the Humanities

notesStmt.note:
Prose description. Use the following as model
Fragment in the Cambridge University Libraries, Taylor-Schechter Collection. Covers Sanhedrin 10.3 - 11.6; Makkot 1.1
Transcription from online images of the manuscript, available at https://fgp.genizah.org. FGP nos. C165816-C165817
Dimensions: 24.2 x 26.5. Approximately 2.5 characters per cm.
EDITED BY: Hayim Lapin
